model

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.ResourceManager

  • public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ResourceManager class gather the model manipulated by the application's user. A ResourceManager object encapsulates a collection of anomalies and its related values.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

        Retrieve an anomaly according to it's coordinates and year.
        Parameters:
        lat - an integer corresponding to the searched anomaly's latitude.
        lon - an integer corresponding to the searched anomaly's longitude.
        year - an integer corresponding to the searched anomaly's year.
        Returns:
        a float corresponding to the searched anomaly's value.
